section.title: ValidateCreditCardAttribute()
section.p: Initializes a new credit card validator.

section.title: ValidateCreditCardAttribute(System.String errorMessage)
section.p: Initializes a new credit card validator.

section.title: ValidateCreditCardAttribute(Castle.ActiveRecord.Framework.Validators.CreditCardValidator.CardType allowedTypes)
section.p: Initializes a new credit card validator.

section.title: ValidateCreditCardAttribute(Castle.ActiveRecord.Framework.Validators.CreditCardValidator.CardType allowedTypes, System.String errorMessage)
section.p: Initializes a new credit card validator.

tr.td: The error message to be displayed if the validation fails.

section.title: ValidateCreditCardAttribute(System.String[] exceptions)
section.p: Initializes a new credit card validator.

tr.td: An array of card numbers to skip checking for (eg. gateway test numbers). Only digits should be provided for the exceptions.

section.title: ValidateCreditCardAttribute(System.String[] exceptions, System.String errorMessage)
section.p: Initializes a new credit card validator.

tr.td: An array of card numbers to skip checking for (eg. gateway test numbers). Only digits should be provided for the exceptions.
The error message to be displayed if the validation fails.

section.title: ValidateCreditCardAttribute(Castle.ActiveRecord.Framework.Validators.CreditCardValidator.CardType allowedTypes, System.String[] exceptions)
section.p: Initializes a new credit card validator.

tr.td: An array of card numbers to skip checking for (eg. gateway test numbers). Only digits should be provided for the exceptions.

section.title: ValidateCreditCardAttribute(Castle.ActiveRecord.Framework.Validators.CreditCardValidator.CardType allowedTypes, System.String[] exceptions, System.String errorMessage)
section.p: Initializes a new credit card validator.

tr.td: An array of card numbers to skip checking for (eg. gateway test numbers). Only digits should be provided for the exceptions.
The error message to be displayed if the validation fails.
